entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023
